title.rendered: RHINO 4X4 EVOLUTION REAR BUMPER BAR – FORD RANGER PX 2012-2015

content.rendered:
THE RHINO 4X4 EVOLUTION REAR BUMPER BAR – FORD RANGER PX 2012-2015 IS READY FOR ORDER NOW

The new and exciting Evolution rear replacement bar is available for order now. These new bars give your 4WD an aggressive but styled look without looking like a farm truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect the rear of your vehicle. They also include a 50mm, 3350kg tow hitch, great angle of departure and a tread for entering the rear of your vehicle. They look great optioned in full stainless steel.

The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Powder coat and available standard in black, or full stainless steel. It is a 3mm and 6mm all steel construction. Our rear bars are very unique will defiantly stand out amongst the crowd.

The bar comes with a square hitch tow bar receiver as standard. This ensures a great angle of departure as the tow hitch is not below the rear bar but contained within.

On request they can be optioned to be non-reverse sensor compatible and supplied with blanketing plugs.

Includes:

– Rear bar in black or full stainless steel

– Square hitch tow bar receiver rated to 3350kg

– Non slip tread plate

 

RHINO 4X4 EVOLUTION REAR BUMPER BAR – FORD RANGER PX 2012-2015

Tough never looked so good

excerpt.rendered: THE FORD RANGER REAR BAR IS READY FOR ORDER NOW
